title: Diff. eq. slope field and 2nd deriv. part - c

content.question: Let y=f(x) be the particular solution to the differential equation with the initial condition f(2)=3. Does f have a relative minimum, a relative maximum, or neither at x=2 ? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Let y=f(x) be the particular solution to the differential equation with the initial condition f(2)=3. Does f have a relative minimum, a relative maximum, or neither at x=2 ? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
